snippet: Myriad Genetics, the company that once held patents on human genes, is now suing two rivals who are conducting gene tests using its other patents not banned by the Supreme Court.
abstract: Myriad Genetics, company that once held patents on human genes, is now suing two rivals who are conducting gene tests using its other patents not banned by the Supreme Court; competitors are Ambry Genetics and Gene by Gene.
lead_paragraph: Myriad Genetics, the company that once held patents on human genes, is now suing two rivals who are conducting gene tests using its other patents not banned by the Supreme Court.

headline.main: 2 Competitors Sued by Genetics Company for Patent Infringement
headline.print_headline: 2 Competitors Sued by Genetics Company for Patent Infringement
